title: Headphone adapter not working... Has there been a definitive fix for this yet?
content:
I have a Pixel 2 (still under warranty I believe) that will not recognise the headphone adapter. Headphones are fine, in use on other devices, but the adapter itself is not recognised.

I can see in the forums that this issue has been commonplace, but I don't see any definitive fix from Google (or anyone else).

Am I missing something?
